HeadComp.title: Intercom vs MSG91 | WhatsApp Business API Comparison
HeadComp.description: Compare Intercom and MSG91 for WhatsApp Business API solutions. See how they differ in WhatsApp pricing, automation, template management, integrations, and support to choose the best WhatsApp platform for your business.

CompareBannerComp.heading: MSG91 vs Intercom
CompareBannerComp.subheading: Intercom offers WhatsApp support within its customer messaging platform, but MSG91 specializes in WhatsApp template management, automated bulk messaging, and seamless integration with other channels, offering greater flexibility for messaging-driven campaigns.

content.name: MSG91
content.des: MSG91, on the other hand, offers a robust WhatsApp communication suite with features like WhatsApp payments, carousel templates, AI-powered chatbots, opt-out management, and template category handling (e.g., utility to marketing). Designed for scalability and automation, MSG91 empowers businesses to deliver rich, personalized, and compliant WhatsApp experiences across customer touchpoints.

content.name: Intercom
content.des: Intercom supports WhatsApp messaging through API integration, enabling customer conversations and outbound messaging via approved templates. However, it lacks advanced WhatsApp functionalities like payments, carousel templates, one-click verification, and built-in template creation.

features.whatsapp_pricing: Costlier, Added margin on Meta pricing
features.whatsapp_template_creation: Intercom lacks a template panel; it redirects to WhatsApp Manager,for template setup.
